instructions: Swipe down from the top of the screen to open Notification Center (on the iPhone X and newer models, you specifically need to swipe down from the top left corner). Scroll to the bottom of the screen and tap the Edit button. This shows all apps that offer Notification Center Widgets. Look for the More Widgets (on some older versions of the iOS, it's labeled Do Not Include ) section at the bottom. If you see an app whose widget you want to add to Notification Center, tap the green + next to it. That app will move to the upper menu (the widgets that are enabled). Tap Done .
